name: Level N (Deja Vu)
description:
I am very new to game development and game jams, but managed to finish a game!

Level N (Deja Vu) is a platformer-puzzle game where the level is exactly the same each time, but what changes is YOU and how you interact with it! With attributes like anti-gravity or a jetpack, you will have to find alternative solutions to reach the end.
